WorkItem.ClosedComment: Not an issue, these are filtered using the 'Special Currency' section and Armor Tokens
WorkItem.Description:
If you uncheck heroic items for both icc10 &25 you still have Sanctified Bloodmage Hood http://www.wowhead.com/?item=51281#comments  listed .
This item is listed as heroic and requires Vanquisher's Mark of Sanctification http://www.wowhead.com/?item=52028#comments  , which are known to drop on 25man heroic version of the lanathel encounter and others.
Â 
Also this item only shows  http://www.wowhead.com/?item=51158 as cost, but doesnt show the Mark of sanctification token which is also required to purchase the final stage of this tier item.
WorkItem.Summary: Sanctified Bloodmage Hood &Co- Itemfilter &cost is wrong
